recipesJson.name: Simply lemonade V2
recipesJson.author: Denske
recipesJson.description: Okay this recipe comes with some sad news...HC lemon has been discontinued and this is my sweet sendoff into the sunlight sky for this flavor...if you have some mix this up it also works very well as a base...for a deliscious addition add .5-1% flv pink guava

reviews.text: It's just simply lemonade, and it's damn good. Will mix again. It's one of those ADV that you could have a bottle sitting around for when you're not in the mood to vape on your weird concoction you have been trying to perfect for months and months.
